segments.text: I'm finding myself increasingly frustrated by this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so utterly engrossed that they miss such obvious dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is practically flooding the kitchen floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are literally climbing for forbidden sweets on an unstable perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad to think about the potential consequences of such inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so peaceful, unaware of the impending mess and potential injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shake her and point out everything that's going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to be responsible for what happens in this home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a perfect storm of small hazards combining into a larger threat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope no one gets hurt from this negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple oversight could lead to a significant problem.
segments.speaker: PAR
